item.title: Get Virtual Memory Information in Java using OSHI library
Get Physical Memory or RAM Information in Java using OSHI library
item.description: Introduction In this tutorial, we are going to explore how to use the OSHI library to get information about the physical memory (RAM) information of the computer in a Java application. By using the API provided by OSHI Java library we will write programs to show memory of the computer and information of all physical devices located on the computer. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Add OSHI library to the Java project To use OSHI Java library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.
